title: How luxury cars use AI without advertising it
description: Luxury car makers increasingly rely on artificial intelligence (AI) to improve performance, safety, comfort, and personalisation in ways most drivers don’t notice. Unlike flashy marketing terms like “self-driving,” these AI systems often work behind the scenes, quietly optimising navigation, detecting issues before they occur, or adapting to driver behaviour. This subtle integration helps vehicles feel smarter and more intuitive without overtly branding them as “AI cars.”

title: Future Force AI: Revolutionizing Protean eGov Technologies' Workforce with AI
description: Protean eGov Technologies has launched the Future Force AI initiative to integrate artificial intelligence into its workforce. Engaging 700 employees, this comprehensive program embeds AI across workflows and functions, aiming for increased productivity and strategic innovation. The initiative underscores the importance of rethinking organizational operations for AI readiness.
content:

title: AI-Enabled Stethoscopes May Boost Diagnosis Of Heart Diseases: Study
description: Amid growing influence of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare, a new large-scale clinical trial published in The Lancet on Thursday showed that an AI-enabled stethoscope can boost early detection of various heart diseases.
content:
